item.title: Player rights in client
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Actually its usualy:

10 = Hidden Admin (most servers) 4 = Hidden Owner (most servers) 3 = Owner/co-owner 2 = Admin 1 = mod

Read full topic

item.title: Player rights in client
item.dc:creator: @leno33 leno33
item.description:
@leno33 wrote:

yeah just as what i R pwn u said. you dont really need that. do it in the character files.

10 = Hidden Admin (most servers)
4 = Hidden Owner (most servers)
3 = Owner
2 = Admin
1 = Co-owner

item.title: Player rights in client
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

The client base I downloaded didn’t have this feature, so I want to add it.
I want to know where to put the code to assign player rights to a certain name in client.java

example:

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dark Karma”)) {
playerrights = 2;
}

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kagerushi”)) {
playerrights = 1;
}

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“movado2”)) {
playerrights = 1;
}[/code]

Read full topic
